response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. After careful consideration, I believe this product could significantly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $950,000. This price reflects its true value and the benefits it can bring to you. I understand that the investment might be substantial, but I assure you that the return on this investment will far outweigh the cost. If you're interested in discussing further details or have any questions, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
